full_summary:
**Janitorial Services - Indian Head, Saskatchewan**
================================SearchTree-----

### Important Dates and Deadlines

**Publication Date:** 2022-12-15

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-24T15:00:00

### Project Overview

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a supplier to provide janitorial services for the Indian Head Research Farm located in Indian Head, Saskatchewan. The services include enhanced cleaning and regular cleaning. The contract is expected to commence on 2023-03-01 and end on 2024-02-29.

### Requirements

*   All suppliers must review the request for proposal (RFP) documents thoroughly.
*   A Mandatory Site Visit is scheduled to take place on January 10, 2023, at the Indian Head Research Farm. This is a requirement for all bidders.
*   Written questions must be submitted by 12:00 p.m., local Saskatchewan time, on January 18, 2023.
*   Submissions must be received by 2:00 p.m., local Regina time, on January 24, 2023.
*   All mandatory requirements and forms must be submitted as per the instructions contained in the RFP.

### Contract Status

The tender is now closed.

### Contract Details

*   **GSIN Code:** K100A - Cleaning and Maintenance, Janitorial
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV - Services
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others.

### Contact Information

*   **Point of Contact:** Zack Flamont
*   **Email:** [zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca](mailto:zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** 639-560-3462

### Additional Resources

*   Tender documents: [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/587ab86a46ee8b1cf520a0180e5b5bdd/rfp_-_english.pdf) and [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/fb7d4b160062d984a35d2ef9bf46073a/rfp
